website_summaries.verdict: This model is suitable for small spaces as well as consumers who prefer a no-frills option that still has convection.
pros: Although the design is fairly trim and basic, this model boasts a reasonably roomy interior and attractive styling
Garners praise for how quickly it heats up
cons: Doesn't have a timer, which is a deal-breaker for some

customer_reviews.title: Also disappointed that there is no latch that brings the rack ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from Cuisinart. The printing around the dials rubbed off within 2 weeks. So we don’t really know what we’re doing when we use it. The top shelf is too high, the lower shelf is too low and it doesn’t toast evenly. Also disappointed that there is no latch that brings the rack out when you open the door. Overall very disappointing. I’d return it if I had the box.
customer_reviews.author: EEP

customer_reviews.title: Hot, reliable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Cuisinart Toaster Oven we have owned in this series, and while they are not terribly exciting, they do accomplish their various missions well. Fast preheat, easy-to-use manual (not digital) controls, decent toast, etc.. At 1800 watts, this is the most powerful one we've owned and the extra 300 watts over our last model is quite noticeable and makes the oven suitable for more baking which requires better heat control. When this one finally weakens (they seem to lose power versus break down) I will probably buy another one. The last one went through 6 very busy years of toasting, baking, broiling and reheating and finally got to the point where it needed replacement.
customer_reviews.author: David Kasabian

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Print function around knobs came off. Customer Support from Cuisinart said not covered under warranty (purchases less than 8 months ago) . Poor service and poor product design. Do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Branton

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven does NOT have a timer. I didn't realize this when purchasing it. Toasts good but the lock of timer is very inconvenient. Even the cheep ine have it so Its quite disappointing that this one doesn't. Otherwise works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with small counter space
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a house-warming present from a friend and liked it so much that I got one for my aunt. Everything works great and I like that I don't need an extra toaster on my kitchen counter. The size is especially great for those who don't have a lot of counter space. My only concern is that the number on the dials are already fading. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking unit that is just built a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking unit that is just built a bit cheap. I like the trays and the units baking performance. I don't like the temperature setting dial. It is very loose and you really don't know what temp you are cooking at. It has so much slop in the dial just feels like you really can't dial it into to a temperature. Not crazy about the off control dial either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful and awesome little oven! We don't have room for a regular oven so we hoped we could get buy with this one and that has definitely been the case! We have cooked a loaf of bread, warmed up food, muffins, kale chips, etc. Its all turned out great and evenly cooked. So impressed. It does get very hot on the outside though so it definitely needs to be on top of the counter or in a spacious area
customer_reviews.author: Kirstan

customer_reviews.title: Oven works but setting dial inks all rubbed off after a month. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The oven works, but the "ON/TOAST/TOASTING SHADE" dials ink all rubbed off, which makes it impossible to use the oven. What a bummer. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, I expected more from Cuisinart.This toaster oven caught on fire and almost burned my house down.This item should be discontinued. This toaster oven doesn’t really toast, it takes way too long to toast compared to our regular toaster. The heating elements leave black burn marks on the toast if you use the dark setting,it doesn’t automatically shut off like a regular toaster does. It gets SUPER hot on the outside and no automatic shut off especially with irresponsible teenagers is very worrisome. It does bake well, I’ve made roasted potatoes, chicken Parmesan & dinner rolls with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Baking part doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and waited a long time for delivery. When it came we used it only for toasting. Recently we tried to use the on button to bake items inside and it doesn't work at all. It's too late to return so it is just a very expensive toaster now. :-( Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Thin walls, plastic bumpers to protect your household walls ...
customer_reviews.text: Thin walls, plastic bumpers to protect your household walls from bursting into flames. Most importantly does not have a timer. completely unhappy with product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but expected better quality from a Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine, but the knobs are very odd (one is very hard to turn, other seems too loose). It just doesn't seem like it's of high quality, but it does work as intended. A bit smaller than the one we had prior and didn't want it to take up so much counter space, so this one is fine if you're not wanting to put in a casserole dish or other large items. Good enough for a small family.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mack

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Heats everything thing up super fast, toasts fast, bakes fast. The only confusing part about the toasting was that if you want to decide on the time you want to toast something instead of going to the right and choosing “light med or dark” go to the left instead where it says ON. If you go for the options on the right it won’t let you stop toasting until the timer goes off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart TOB-60N1 Toaster Oven Broiler with Convection is simple to use. Great for teens learning how to prepare foods. This unit works as good as the more expensive ones. Bought this to replace my other Cuisinart TOB-60N1 which I've had 4 years and still works great. I use it 4-6 times daily and put it through a lot. My regular oven still looks brand new inside. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Billy21

customer_reviews.title: I hate it
customer_reviews.text: It is very limited on how you can cook with it. You can't do a time bake because the timer is set for toasting bread so if you want to bake something for 45 minutes you have to watch the clock. There's more versatility in a Hamilton Beach, Black and Decker and Oster toaster oven at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about this that I like. My 10 year old toaster oven is more advanced. If I didn’t throw the box away I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RobLow

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible appliance. The toaster barely works
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible appliance. The toaster barely works. The crumbs accumulate in the crack on the door making cleaning difficult at best. The dials are nearly useless and hard to read. Who designs these things?
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: you can't make toast quietly!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is compact but nicely roomy inside. Simple to use and clean. But the toast cycle is based on a timer mechanism. The timer is ANNOYINGLY loud, so the whole time your bread is toasting you are listening to the oven loudly tick. (I don't mind the ding sound when it's done, but that's loud, too) I do not want loud noises first thing in the morning, so I returned mine. Otherwise, it's a perfectly good oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R. Soltys

customer_reviews.title: This product is not reliable for this household.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product and have decided it is not working well. It burns toast and other items. I would like to return this broiler and order something that works better for us. Thanks for helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: I disliked all of it.
customer_reviews.text: it gets dangerously hot on the outside. I used it to toast two pieces of bread.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen blackney

customer_reviews.title: Just ok!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it doesn’t turn off automatically. If you forget to turn it off it remains on which is dangerous for over heating. A little disappointed with this toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made toaster for money
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to find correct toast settings by temperature, rack position and time, then pieces of bread closet to window do not toast as even. Only two rack positions but rack can be inserted right side up or upside down to get for positions. Baking pan is aluminum and functional. Only negative is crumb tray. When pulling it out crumbs get scrapped off by burner. Baking: be very careful test convection vs normal. We still prefer oven but it can bake potatoes, thin items, hard to control exterior to interior baking rates.
customer_reviews.author: BruceH

customer_reviews.title: Best oven ever!
customer_reviews.text: I received my oven yesterday and used it this morning for biscuits. I love it already. It cooked biscuits in less than 10 minutes and the kitchen stayed cool (no hot oven running for 20 minutes). I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Cook McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Superior to the Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The larger 12" toaster oven is perfect for pizzas (and they taste better than doing them in a traditional stove/oven), cuts cooking time in half, and is very easy to clean up and use. I'm throwing away my Hamilton Beach toaster oven because the Cuisinart is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cramer

customer_reviews.title: This oven was not designed for humans
customer_reviews.text: The dials are not readily readable. The oven overheats. The warming option works well, As does the toast function .
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but not good value. Not well made. Almost impossible to see the dials. Dials themselves are mechanical! 1950’s technology. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: I.S

customer_reviews.title: Compact and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I must have needed a new convection because this one works really fast! It's easy to clean and operate. It's quiet and I like the knobs. It doesn't have a light but I believe it's priced that way and ok with me. I'd s buy it again. It's small but it fits what we need. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this toaster oven, but it's spot on temp control and ease of use with stainless steel interior is superior. It doesn't take up much space, yet bakes or broils enough for 2 people every time. I would buy it again and hope it lasts a long time. I haven't had my oven on since I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed for reasons stated.
customer_reviews.text: The oven has a smell after it heats. The top outside surface gets extremely hot to the touch, and the information on the dial is not well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't toast!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily purchased to replace an earlier model that had broken after many years of use. I imagine the 'toasting' component isn't the reason people purchase; but if that's what you're looking for, do not buy. A slice of sourdough bread didn't toast after two cycles on the 'dark' setting/a very slight crunch on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Tm

customer_reviews.title: Very good as small enough to fit in a counter top.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oven. It will reheat frozen fry chicken, broiled fish, and may other foods, like onion rings, french fries etc. It also makes a killer roast beef and also a delicious pork tenderloin. I love this oven and cannot be without it. Great purchase, extremely happy. Thank You Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, works as it should
customer_reviews.text: If you've never had a toaster oven, go ahead and give this one a try. It''s amazing how much time it saves (it heats faster) and it has a nice, clean modern look.
customer_reviews.author: mgirla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY CUISINART TOASTER OVEN
customer_reviews.text: At last I can have my toast the shade I prefer. Baking is a dream with convection oven. I do not mind that I must use microwave to time what I am baking. This oven is wonderful (Cuisinart TOB-60N1)
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: So far it works as described but requires reading and initial patience.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size; just fit the cabinet base. Dislike the knobs: hard to see temp, understand cooking type, and on/off knob hard to turn. At least the previous one I had burned baked goods- first on top, then on bottom even though temp set at 350. Right now, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: CHenry

customer_reviews.title: Works great a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster oven is very stylist and easy to clean. A little clumsy with the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Still love it though I gave 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: The timer runs out too fast. I have to run it 3 times to fully cook. I had this unit before and the timer was for a longer time ! I hate that they changed it.
customer_reviews.author: MyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The door sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The door sticks, I have to sometimes force it to close. Also the dials feel cheap, not very sturdy. Convection seems to burn items quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Words
customer_reviews.text: This oven was very nice looking and I was excited that it matched my other appliances so well. Unfortunately, the dial settings were so tiny I was unable to read them with glasses. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerBernadette

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart TOB-60N1 Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: It's nice toaster oven.....Works good...I got it for small things to bake , cook , or reheat.... instead of turner the wall ovens on...LOL....and using to microwave.... It Is What it is.... Thanks Amazon...Fast delivery as always.... Merry Christmas All
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Can't use if labels rub off the dials
customer_reviews.text: The previous complaints about the labels rubbing off the dials were SPOT ON. The labels started coming off with less than two weeks of use. How can you use a toaster if you can't tell if you are set to bake it broil or whether you are on light or dark toast? Definitely returning it and wish I had not ignored those other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Roll Tide

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy. Great toaster function and great alternative to regular convection oven - especially on hot summer days. Don't know how we ever did without it.
customer_reviews.author: RGD1719

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t willing to pay for the digital control, my only disappointment is that it does not notify me when it get to temperature. Love it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Bushko

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Just miss the timer and auto off feature from previous Cusinart
customer_reviews.author: Diane Eileen Hampton

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toaster/Oven  out there!!️
customer_reviews.text: The best toaster/oven so far I had one that was $300 was not near as good as this one EXCELLENT CHOICE !!️
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Simple, and elegant toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: In the short time I’ve used it, it cooks very fast so if you want your toast lightly toasted, set it to light any thing more will just render it burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Slow when roasting bread.
customer_reviews.text: Very slow when using it to toast bread. Had an older version and liked it a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Got This!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is perfect for a single person or a couple. I bought some pans that would fit and I rarely use my big oven anymore. I wish it had a light inside, but I'm not sure if any of the smaller ovens come with lights due to their size. It gets hot on the outside so move away from walls and other objects while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Libbi Howell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This a great convection/ toaster oven. Owned one for 2 years until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t turn the timer off once on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for toasting bagels and croissants. Like it except there is no way to turn toaster off once the timer knob is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Le Khanh Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very basic.
customer_reviews.text: Loved our previous Cuisinart so went with a newer model when we moved into new house. This one looks cheaply made compared to previous model and can't stand the "ticking time bomb" timer noise when making toast.
customer_reviews.author: Scott @ Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older version of this same model that finally stopped working after over 10 years of faithful use! Same easy to use design and high quality. Perfect for frozen pizza, toast, sandwiches or any type of quick baking or broiling. We use this in my house and not a microwave as this is much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Brand disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Small lettering hard to read. Needs a light inside. Dark. Disappointing in the quality of the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: William H Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Love my toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Love my new toaster oven. But the delivery man left it at my garage door! That is Not okay! With all the thefts!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: 25-50 degrees F of variability on the dials
customer_reviews.text: The dials are very low tolerance, I.e. setting temperature has 25-50 degrees or innaccuracy. Obviously this is not suited to anyone that needs a serious oven, but probably fine for basic toast making.
customer_reviews.author: BigWillyStyle

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. I don’t have to use my oven so much. It heats up quickly and is wonderful for leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Janicke

customer_reviews.title: No timer
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good little toaster oven. I use the convection bake feature almost exclusively. It is disappointing not to have a built-in timer or time/bake feature. Also the limited choice of rack or pan positions is a little inconvenient. It does bake items a little quicker than my previous toaster oven so some adjustment has been necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a toaster oven. You put things inside them to toast or other things. It makes toast well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one or two people sized meals
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she uses it all the time for small meals. It's more efficient than using a full size oven for a meal for one or two people
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money but ‘convection fan’, I can’t find it??
customer_reviews.text: It won’t wow are you but it will warm your food. If it truly has a convection fan, I can’t find it??
customer_reviews.author: N77E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Great small toaster oven - sleek and easy to clean - made a perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great / Works great
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I bought a second one for my sister for Christmas. Looks great. Works perfect every time. Great for toasting and reheating anything that gets weird or soggy in a Microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking toaster, good quality oven for money. Cooks fast built should last a good while. Does not take up that much room like some of the other models out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst appliance I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Only the toaster function worked, but not well. Two widely separated elements made only strips of toast on the bread. The convection only worked once and then the oven stopped working completely. Threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Lipkind Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat is NOT accurate and I must keep a thermometer in the oven to use it to cook!! Also makes noises that I am not very happy with. A disappointment to me!!
customer_reviews.author: moppy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toaster oven. Cooks and roasts just as it should. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KathyK

customer_reviews.title: It met my needs best
customer_reviews.text: Wished it was smaller. I’m not using it for a large family
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very roomie on the inside.
customer_reviews.text: I had read a few negative comments about this, but I love it. Very roomie.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wandrisco

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the same one I have had for years and its exactly the same! LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Delorme

customer_reviews.title: Good deal good toaster
customer_reviews.text: Better price than bed bath n beyond even w their 20% discount.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to its Name! Quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: barbara flanders

customer_reviews.title: Less room than most.
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven it works great and takes up much less room than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to use And change settings convection oven works great
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster oven convection for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven,I have the same one so I bought it for Christmas for my daughter. It’s easy to use, easy to read and just the right size for counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Phelan

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to see the controls!
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to keep it on to use to bake. The last one I had also Cuisinart was wonderful easy to use, why did they change the design? I used it for baking everything and loved it. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Kahrs

customer_reviews.title: Convection oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this convection oven. Would recommend to anyone. It arrived quickly and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: This oven has been a joy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to read the instructions for use, but once I understood them, this oven has been a joy. I have not cooked a lot in it, but it deals with easy functions very well.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great lil oven!
customer_reviews.text: Thought we’d ordered a regular ole oven; havta get used to turbo usage! Works great. Love their products.
customer_reviews.author: JENNI K

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up that much space on counter top.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It's small and very easy to use. Perfect for 1 person.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Bogumil

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This small Oven is great. Cooks fast and it’s also steady .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The control will not turn to just bake
customer_reviews.text: In order to bake, I keep turning the toasting control - poor engineering
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hine

customer_reviews.title: No oven timer
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Does not fit 9x13 pan as advertised. No oven timer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart makes a Quality Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toaster oven!! Really love this .. it does get hot, and super easy to clean and maintain. Very attractive sitting out on counter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gator Mom

customer_reviews.title: I stand by their reputation
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for in toaster oven
customer_reviews.author: happiness

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the oven and it is so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Settings are a little small for my old eyes, but am very pleased over all.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A huge waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This product was awful. It is analog, not digital and didn't work properly right from the beginning. We tried to work with it but by the time we decided that it was not going to work properly, the return window had closed. A huge waste of time and money. We expected more from Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: It does it all- bake, toast, broil, warm and doesn’t take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: I live it! It’s like having two ovens in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Dial labels - defective
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, dial labels wear off completely after a short time of normal use and cleaning. No response from Cuisinart. No replacement dials available. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rader

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: its a toaster over . . but convection is nice. looks good works well
customer_reviews.author: seattle c

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: It does everythning I expected it to do. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome to be able to bake or toast food without ...
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome to be able to bake or toast food without cranking the big oven. It works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jay McHam

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised----- Arrived on promised date in good condition. Thanks Don
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised----- Arrived on promised date in good condition. Thanks Don Reeves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Oven quit working in less than 60 days. Pretty expensive toaster!
customer_reviews.author: colleen kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lettering around the bottom dial has worn off in a very short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Raft

customer_reviews.title: Dented, but works great
customer_reviews.text: there is a big dent on the top of the oven when I opened the box, but I can live with that. Should have been a reduced price. Otherwise I love it, works great.
customer_reviews.author: wolffy

customer_reviews.title: Has a ding on top! Too hot to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a ding on top! Too hot to work with!
customer_reviews.author: LGeller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Extremely cheap quality. The timer was light an old fashioned egg time-- tick tick tick ding! Not what you would expect for cost. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte York

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It toasts ok, but the knobs are inconvenient to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K

customer_reviews.title: I have not figured out how to use the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not figured out how to use the other features apart from the Toaster. The instructions for the operation of the other features are not clear and I have not been able to activate the always ON position to use the other features.
customer_reviews.author: CELESTE PORTE

customer_reviews.title: Tin can
customer_reviews.text: Rattled like tin lizzy on convection mode. A model T made less noise.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K.

product_meta.title: Cuisinart TOB-60N1 Toaster Oven Broiler with Convection, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelCuisinart’s Chef’s Toaster Convection Oven boasts 15 cooking functions and offers special settings for speed convection, sandwiches, and bagels. With 1800 watts, the Oven quickly heats up and the Exact Heat sensor produces precise temperatures and perfect results every time. The roomy easy-clean nonstick interior can hold a 12-inch pizza, 9 slices of bread, a 9" x 13" baking pan, or an entire chicken for your family dinner! Even toast is elevated in this Oven, with our Always Even toast control, so everybody gets a slice with the shade they want. Features: 1800 watts of power|0.6-cubic-foot capacity fits a 12" pizza and 6 slices of toast|Functions: bake broil toast convection bake convection broil and warm|Precise toast shade control|Nonstick interior for easy cleaning|Brushed stainless steel finish|Power On LED indicator|Slide-out crumb tray|Recipe book|Limited 2-year warranty|BPA free*
feature_bullets: 1800 watts can heat the inside up to 500 Degree
Bake, broil, toast, convection bake and Warm functions
Nonstick coating covers the interior to make cleaning easy and quick
